features: This package includes one 82.5-ounce bottle of Amazon Basics liquid laundry detergent, enough for 110 loads.
Get 2x more loads per bottle with concentrated liquid laundry detergent from Amazon Basics, an Amazon Brand (versus a standard-concentrated detergent [1.56oz dose]).
Gives your clothes a bright, fresh scent so your laundry smells great.
Safe in both standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines.
Running low? Restock by asking, "Alexa, order Amazon Basics liquid laundry detergent" through your Alexa device.
body.description: Amazon Basics liquid laundry detergent has 2x more loads per bottle (versus a standard-concentrated detergent [1.56oz dose]). Safe in both standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines, Amazon Basics liquid laundry detergent comes in a variety of scents including Fresh Scent, Free and Clear, Lavender, and Clean Linen. Amazon Basics concentrated laundry detergent is safe for septic systems and, as always, contains no phosphates. This package includes one 82.5-ounce bottle of Amazon Basics concentrated laundry detergent, enough for 110 medium loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Fresh Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent See the Difference For regular loads, fill slightly below line 1. For large or heavily soiled loads, add more. Super Concentrated Powerful stain fighters get your whites white and your colors bright after every wash. Standard + HE Compatible Amazon Basics Liquid Laundry Detergent is suitable to use in both high efficiency (HE) and standard washing machines. Variety of Scents Amazon Basics liquid laundry detergent comes in a variety of scents including Fresh Scent, Free and Clear, Lavender, and Clean Linen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s Good But The Packing Is Poor
reviews.reviewText: I have senisitive skin and I tried this detergent on my compact washer and it is very thick liquid and very concentrated. It cleans clothes very well and removes odor from the clothes and stains. I wouldn’t compre this to any other brand because other brands have more concentrated ingredients and it works more then this but this is good for when you can’t get those named brand detergents and you need one until then. However when this came to me the package was not damaged but there was a massive leak in the box. The bottle and the cap was in good condition it just leaked I think amazon needs to put sealing around the top caps to prevent it leaking and also to have it packaged safely so it won’t explode on the other items that come with this product. Overall though it is washer friendly and you just gotta use the right measurements and it will do its job right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, good price
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t expect to like this laundry detergent as much as I do. It works so well, leaves no residue behind, and it smells so light and fresh. My clothes are soft and clean and this detergent didn’t set off any allergic reactions in family members with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars FRESH is a strong, lingering scent
reviews.reviewText: The detergent cleans well, but the FRESH option is much too strongly scented; the Free & Clear fragrance free option is definitely preferable.Leakage during shipment was also problematic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switched from Amazon pods
reviews.reviewText: Chose the same scent as AB pods but not sure the scent is actually the same. This cleans well and the scent is nice without being overbearing. Even with out very hard water I don't need the recommended amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans my clothes
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at the small packaging but this detergent is so concentrated that only a small amount is needed. We live on a farm and I want to tell you, we have dirt! My clothing comes out clean, smells clean and the color remain bright. The smaller container is easier to handle than the large bulky bottles I buy in the store. Less waste also. I will most definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: That Amazon Basics Concentrated Liquid Laundry Detergent is my favourite. Work very well. My clothes are so clean and fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am always wanting to try new laundry soap, so I decided to try this one out. At the time, the price was great. I tried the lavender first and the smell was amazing. Its super concentrated and cleans our clothes as good as the expensive stuff. I would have given it 5 stars, But I have a few issues. First, they don't always have them in stock. and they prices goes up and down every other day it seems. We are a family of 5 and go through laundry often, so when I need soap, I need soap. Not a month later. Nor at double the price I paid 2 months ago for it. As much as I like this soap, I won't buy it often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: This laundry detergent is just as good if not better than the name brand detergents like the Tide Free and Gentle. Not to mention it’s a fraction of the price! I continue to repurchase this laundry detergent over and over!
